item.description:
We will be trying something new, a soup night!  This was discussed at the Holiday party and there seemed to be interest so I am suggesting that we try it this Sunday.  I'll provide a big pot of Cioppino (a seafood chowder) and some good bread.  If someone else wants to bring a vegetarian soup that would be great but please contact me first.  We will stop the meeting a little early so that we can to soup and visiting.  Hope to see you there.

Peace and Light,
Theresa
item.why: It will give us more of chance to socialize and catch up with one another during this harsh winter.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Discussion Group and Soup Night
